name: Introduction to Computational Linguistics
description: This course introduces the fundamentals of computational linguistics, covering topics such as natural language processing, language models, and machine learning.

name: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: This course provides an introduction to the fundamentals of data structures and algorithms, including topics such as sorting algorithms, data structures, and algorithm analysis.

name: Formal Language Theory
description: This course provides an introduction to the fundamentals of formal language theory, including topics such as regular expressions, finite automata, context-free grammars, and Turing machines.

name: Natural Language Processing
description: This course provides an introduction to the fundamentals of natural language processing, including topics such as syntax, semantics, and discourse.

name: Computational Linguistics
description: This course covers topics in computational linguistics, including language modeling, language generation, and machine translation.
